item.description:
Seasoned bike commuters will present a broad overview of commuting-related topics from logistics, carrying stuff, basic maintenance, and traffic safety geared to those just beginning or thinking about it. Nothing too in depth.

*** EXISTING MEMBERS, PLEASE PUBLICIZE AND BRING A FRIEND! ***

This will be conducted more as an open discussion than a formal presentation. Following is the proposed agenda. Experienced commuters, please consider 2 or 3 of the best tips you can give us on one or more of the topics. Beginners, please think about specific questions you have around them so that you can ask them during that part of the meeting.


I) Introductions (7:00 - 7:15)

. . . Name
. . . Town of residence
. . . Town of workplace
. . . Commute length (whether currently by bike or not)
. . . Commuting status: Thinking about it, started recently, or number of years

II) Beginners Night Discussion (7:15 - 8:45)

. . . A) Getting started

. . . . . . 1) The bike - style, fit, tires

. . . . . . 2) Selecting a route

. . . . . . 3) Potential "bike buddy" options

. . . B) Logistics

. . . . . . 1) Hygiene and clothing

. . . . . . 2) Carrying stuff

. . . . . . 3) Inclement weather

. . . . . . 4) Long distance

. . . C) Traffic Safety

. . . . . . 1) Need for cyclist education regardless of bike-specific infrastructure

. . . . . . 2) Vehicular mindset (obey laws and right-of-way, lateral positioning, signalling turns)

. . . . . . 3) Drawbacks of "pedestrian" style riding (sidewalk, crosswalk, facing traffic, weaving)

. . . . . . 4) Techniques and skills (straight line, head turn, merging, braking, emergency manuveurs)

. . . . . . 5) After dark

. . . D) Maintenance

. . . . . . 1) What you should know how to do

. . . . . . 2) Tools/parts to carry at all times

III) Upcoming Meetings (8:45 - 9:00)

. . . A) Bike to Work Day (Friday)

. . . . . . Bike trains around town in AM?

. . . . . . Meet for lunch in common areas?

. . . B) "Business"

. . . . . . June 3 - LAB Road I course (BCM)

. . . . . . June 20 - DIY Bike Maintenance

. . . . . . July 18 - Focus on Traffic Safety

. . . A) "Pleasure"

. . . . . . Sea Dogs Game (when?)

. . . . . . BBQ/Picnic (when, where?)
item.name: Beginners' Night
